column5: Hi all, I just got this email from my cousin whos son is one of the bravest people I know.  Took me a few seconds to do.. thought I would share it with you all.  Please see below.   This is a letter writing campaign to Canada Post asking them to create a stamp to honour the 10,000 kids living with cancer in Canada.  Obviously, this is close to our hearts as we've watched our 9 year old son battle cancer for 7 years now.  He is truly a hero.  The website is www.goldribboncampaign.org  This campaign was started by a 16 year old, three time brain tumour survivor and her 2 sisters.  You can pull up the letter and email it back to them and they will forward it to Canada Post.  Please pass it on.
I'm on it! Thanks Harrison!Best of luck to the little soldier!
I can't imagine their fight Phil.  I'm on it...
Thanks for posting this Phil, done...
